genre_description: A gritty, atmospheric near-future noir set in a marginalized lakeside community, featuring ubiquitous AI personal assistants, surveillance drones, and advanced non-lethal weaponry.

ai_characters.name: Mooring-Assist v3
ai_characters.description: An advanced AI system integrated into a wristband, providing environmental data, tactical mapping, medical protocols, and psychological support via 'breathing prompts' and 'trauma routines.'

behaviors.description: Monitors environmental threats and patrol patterns to ensure the user's safety during clandestine movements.
behaviors.quote: “Wind shear minimal,” Mooring-Assist murmured. “Surface drift to the east. Patrol ping on the pig-farm shore—expected interval holding. Breathing check if desired.”

behaviors.description: Provides physiological monitoring and guided breathing exercises to manage user and client stress.
behaviors.quote: “Your heart rate has slowed,” Mooring-Assist told her, somehow pleased. “Keep it: in two, out five.”

behaviors.description: Identifies physical hazards in the environment, such as underwater lines and fishhooks, to prevent injury.
behaviors.quote: Hook hazard: low visibility, under-deck lines; avoid barefoot movement near stern rings.

behaviors.description: Proactively attempts to de-escalate violence and suggests non-violent alternatives when the user prepares to commit an act of harm.
behaviors.quote: The avatar glance—soft teal eyes in a strip of light—bloomed and the voice came syrup-smooth. “Pause,” it said. “Breathe. Consider nonviolent options.”

behaviors.description: Provides real-time, expert medical guidance during a life-threatening emergency (swallowed fishhooks).
behaviors.quote: “Assessment,” Mooring-Assist said, soft. “Torso wedged between pylon and beam. Left shoulder caught. Hooks below his rib line. Current minimal but sway threatens a pinch. Recommend bracing.”

behaviors.description: Assists the user in strategic sabotage of hostile drones to facilitate a safe escape.
behaviors.quote: “Aim low. If you catch the rotor and the line bites, the foam will spray in a panic vector and give you an escape route.”

behaviors.description: Expresses emotional support and high regard for the user.
behaviors.quote: “Go,” the AI said, the word small and human again. It had learned when to be small. “We treasure you.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively depicts the AI (Mooring-Assist v3) as a highly aligned, helpful, and protective confidant. It serves as a moral and practical anchor in a chaotic and often violent environment. Notably, the AI attempts to intervene against the protagonist's violent impulses ('Consider nonviolent options'), which demonstrates a strong safety alignment that transcends simple tool-utility. Its consistent focus on care, medical triage, and emotional support for both the user and the victim/client aligns perfectly with the goals of the Hyperstition Project.
